e="preserve">Valdir Ataualpa Ramirez Espinosa, usually known as Valdir Espinosa (October 17, 1947 – February 27, 2020) was a Brazilian football (soccer) manager. He was born in Porto Alegre, Brazil. Espinosa was known for managing Cerro Porteño, Botafogo, and Corinthians.
Espinosa died on February 27, 2020 from surgery-related problems in Rio de Janeiro, aged 72.
